Title: Work with enthusiasm, increase production, support the just struggle of the Vietnamese people against America to save the nation
Publisher: Hunan renmin chubanshe (湖南人民出版社)
Notes: Working in the grainfield is linked to supporting the Vietnamese. On the left rifles stand ready, on the right the grain transforms into waves. In the background a Vietnamese throws a grenade, others fire rifles, on the right (American) airplanes are crashing.
